---
name: "Material Design & Theming"
about: "Adopt Material Design principles and theming for a modern UI."
title: "Feature: Material Design & Theming"
labels: [enhancement]
---

**Summary:**
Update the UI to use Material Design components and support theming.

**Details:**
- Use a Material Design library (e.g., Material UI, Materialize, or similar for your stack).
- Add support for light/dark themes and school colors.
- Ensure accessibility and responsiveness.

**Benefit:**
Creates a more modern, attractive, and user-friendly interface.
